name: RTP Production System
tagline: UMBC/ASL Matlab RTP Generation System for AIRS, CrIS, IASI Satellites
body:
## Conventions

This is the RTP production manual.  Please feel free to improve/edit.

* Each instrument has it's own set of thresholds
* ECMWF forecast, ERA re-analysis, MERRA re-analysis fields can be added
* RTP files contain clear, site, random, and DCC observations (defined below)

That's it for now.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
